text: Regina Resnik (August 30, 1922 â€“ August 8, 2013) was an American mezzo-soprano opera singer. She sang on many stages in the United States. She was known for performing in Il trovatore, La Gioconda, and in Aida.Regina Resnik obituary, The Guardian (12 August 2013) She was born in The Bronx, New York. She died at age ninety.Regina Resnik, The Daily Telegraph (26 August 2013) ==References== ==Other websites== * *Interview with Regina Resnik by Bruce Duffie, March 16, 1987 Category:American opera singers Category:Musicians from New York (state) Category:1922 births Category:2013 deaths
title: Regina Resnik
